description: Describes load-based auto scaling configurations for specified layers. Required Permissions: To use this action, an IAM user must have a Show, Deploy, or Manage permissions level for the stack, or an attached policy that explicitly grants permissions. For more information about user permissions, see Managing User Permissions.

nested_items.name: LoadBasedAutoScalingConfigurations
nested_items.description: An array of LoadBasedAutoScalingConfiguration objects that describe each layer's configuration.

nested_items.name: LayerId
nested_items.description: The layer ID.

nested_items.name: Enable
nested_items.description: Whether load-based auto scaling is enabled for the layer.

nested_items.name: UpScaling
nested_items.description: An AutoScalingThresholds object that describes the upscaling configuration, which defines how and when OpsWorks Stacks increases the number of instances.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances to add or remove when the load exceeds a threshold.

nested_items.name: ThresholdsWaitTime
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in minutes, that the load must exceed a threshold before more instances are added or removed.

nested_items.name: IgnoreMetricsTime
nested_items.description: The amount of time (in minutes) after a scaling event occurs that OpsWorks Stacks should ignore metrics and suppress additional scaling events. For example, OpsWorks Stacks adds new instances following an upscaling event but the instances won't start reducing the load until they have been booted and configured. There is no point in raising additional scaling events during that operation, which typically takes several minutes. IgnoreMetricsTime allows you to direct OpsWorks Stacks to suppress scaling events long enough to get the new instances online.

nested_items.name: CpuThreshold
nested_items.description: The CPU utilization threshold, as a percent of the available CPU. A value of -1 disables the threshold.

nested_items.name: MemoryThreshold
nested_items.description: The memory utilization threshold, as a percent of the available memory. A value of -1 disables the threshold.

nested_items.name: LoadThreshold
nested_items.description: The load threshold. A value of -1 disables the threshold. For more information about how load is computed, see Load (computing).

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: Custom CloudWatch auto scaling alarms, to be used as thresholds. This parameter takes a list of up to five alarm names, which are case sensitive and must be in the same region as the stack.
(string) ---
